item.title: I'm quitting cmd
item.description: Background Regarding operating systems I prefer Linux over Windows. Even though in my job I'm forced to use Windows. To make my work on Windows more pleasant I've been using Command-line alongside with vim, grep, AWK and other Unix/Linux tools. Using cmd before Windows 10 was not a very visual appealing experience. It suppose to be just a rectangle box with a text and somehow they made it hard to read and write text.
